Google Inc. isn't looking to get into film, TV or other content production, however. We will work with content providers but it is very unlikely that we will get into actual content production, Eric Schmidt told journalists after a keynote speech at the IFA show in Berlin. The announcement came less than a week after rival Apple unveiled its latest Apple TV product, and heats up a battle for consumers' attention
